> 
> A lightweight and extensible renderer that render HTML string on Lynx.

HTML â†’ Lynx Renderer é€šè¿‡è§£æ HTML å¹¶è½¬æ¢ä¸ºä¸€æ£µä¸­é—´è¯­ä¹‰æ ‘ï¼ˆLynxNodeï¼‰ï¼Œæœ€ç»ˆæ¸²æŸ“ä¸º Lynx åŸç”Ÿç»„ä»¶ã€‚

è¯¥é¡¹ç›®å¹¶éæµè§ˆå™¨å®ç°ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª é¢å‘åŸç”Ÿçš„ HTML å®‰å…¨é›†æ¸²æŸ“æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºï¼š

HTML â†’ Lynx Renderer parses HTML into a semantic intermediate representation
(LynxNode), then renders it into Lynx native components.

It is not a browser, but a native-oriented, safe HTML rendering solution,
suitable for:

 * Content & detail pages
 * Rich text rendering
 * Configuration-driven pages
